item.description: Walk a portion of the Canalside Rail Trail from the Farren Care Center on Montague City Road in Turners Falls, MA to the rail yard in South Deerfield, with a possible extension past the rail yard and along the side of the river in East Deerfield.  The trail section we plan to walk  intersects Montague City Road near the Farren Care Center and continues over the old railroad bridge across the Connecticut River, past part of the nursery fields for Stewart's nursery, and terminates at the train yard in East Deerfield; depending on energy and interest, we may continue out along the river for a bit farther. This is an out-and-back trip, should take about an hour and a half, maybe a little more. This walk is on flat, mostly paved roads the whole way.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be parked in the lot across from the Farren Care Center on Montague City Road, Turners

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Canalside Rail Trail: Over the River to see the Trains
